0x40B16551.name: GET_TRAIN_DOOR_OPEN_RATIO

params.name: train
params.description: The train to obtain the door ratio for.

0x40B16551.description: Gets the ratio that a door is open for on a train.

examples.code:
local doorCount = GetTrainDoorCount(train)
for doorIndex = 0, doorCount - 1 do
    local ratio = GetTrainDoorOpenRatio(train, doorIndex)
    print("Door " .. tostring(doorIndex) .. " is open by a ratio of " .. tostring(ratio))
end

0x40B16551.resultsDescription: A value between 0.0 (fully closed) and 1.0 (fully open).
